Section.title: Divisibility By 8
Section.Paragraph: This specification makes frequent use of values that must be evenly divisible by 8. Formally, a number n is evenly divisible by 8 if n mod 8 = 0.
The property of being divisible by 8 is preserved over addition. That is, if two numbers n and m are divisible by 8, then n + m is divisible by 8.
